summary.span: 提供一組方法和屬性，可協助偵錯程式碼。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that help debug your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用中的方法類別來列印偵錯的資訊和檢查您的邏輯，判斷提示中，您可以讓您的程式碼更穩固而不會影響您運送的產品的效能和程式碼大小。If you use methods in the class to print debugging information and check your logic with assertions, you can make your code more robust without impacting the performance and code size of your shipping product. 這個類別會提供方法以顯示 對話方塊中，並發出判斷提示，將一律失敗。This class provides methods to display an dialog box, and to emit an assertion that will always fail. 這個類別會提供寫入方法，下列變化中： ， ，和。This class provides write methods in the following variations: , , and . 和類別提供以動態方式控制追蹤輸出的方式。The and classes provide means to dynamically control the tracing output. 您可以修改這些參數的值，不需要重新編譯您的應用程式。You can modify the values of these switches without recompiling your application. 如需使用組態檔來設定參數資訊，請參閱類別和[追蹤參數](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md)主題。For information on using the configuration file to set a switch, see the class and the [Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md) topic. 您可以藉由新增自訂的追蹤輸出的目標執行個體，或移除執行個體從集合。You can customize the tracing output's target by adding instances to or removing instances from the collection. 集合由兩者共用而類別; 新增任一類別的追蹤接聽程式將接聽程式加入至兩者。The collection is shared by both the and the classes; adding a trace listener to either class adds the listener to both. 根據預設，類別會發出追蹤輸出。By default, the class emits trace output. > [!NOTE] > 加入追蹤接聽程式，集合可能會導致在追蹤時擲回例外狀況，如果追蹤接聽程式所使用的資源無法使用。Adding a trace listener to the collection can cause an exception to be thrown while tracing, if a resource used by the trace listener is not available. 條件並擲回的例外狀況取決於追蹤接聽程式，並無法在本主題中列舉。The conditions and the exception thrown depend on the trace listener and cannot be enumerated in this topic. 它可能會很有用的呼叫置於中的方法`try` / `catch`來偵測並處理從追蹤接聽項的任何例外狀況區塊。It may be useful to place calls to the methods in `try`/`catch` blocks to detect and handle any exceptions from trace listeners. 您可以修改使用縮排層級方法或屬性。You can modify the level of indentation using the method or the property. 若要修改 縮排的間距，請使用屬性。To modify the indent spacing, use the property. 您可以指定是否要自動在每次寫入後清除輸出緩衝區，藉由設定屬性設`true`。You can specify whether to automatically flush the output buffer after each write by setting the property to `true`. 若要設定並如，您可以編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To set the and for , you can edit the configuration file corresponding to the name of your application. 組態檔應該格式化，如下列範例所示。The configuration file should be formatted as shown in the following example. ```xml ``` 屬性會套用至方法的。The attribute is applied to the methods of . 支援的編譯器忽略這些方法的呼叫，除非 「 偵錯 」 定義為條件式編譯符號。Compilers that support ignore calls to these methods unless "DEBUG" is defined as a conditional compilation symbol. 請參閱編譯器的文件，以判斷是否支援，以及定義條件式編譯符號的語法。Refer to a compiler's documentation to determine whether is supported and the syntax for defining a conditional compilation symbol. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Studio C# 和 Visual Basic 專案中，根據預設，"DEBUG"條件式編譯符號定義偵錯組建，而且已定義 「 追蹤 」 符號，同時偵錯和發行組建。In Visual Studio C# and Visual Basic projects, by default, the "DEBUG" conditional compilation symbol is defined for debug builds, and the "TRACE" symbol is defined for both debug and release builds. 如需有關如何停用此行為的資訊，請參閱 Visual Studio 文件。For information about how to disable this behavior, see the Visual Studio documentation. 如需在 Visual c + + 中的條件式偵錯資訊，請參閱[Debug 類別 (C + + /cli CLI)](/cpp/dotnet/debug-class-cpp-cli)。For information about conditional debugging in Visual C++, see [Debug Class (C++/CLI)](/cpp/dotnet/debug-class-cpp-cli). 若要定義的"DEBUG"條件式編譯符號在 C# 中，新增`/d:DEBUG`至編譯器命令列選項，當您編譯您的程式碼使用命令列，或新增`#define DEBUG`至檔案頂端。To define the "DEBUG" conditional compilation symbol in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` option to the compiler command line when you compile your code using a command line, or add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，新增`/d:DEBUG=True`至編譯器命令列選項，或新增`#Const DEBUG=True`檔案。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` option to the compiler command line or add `#Const DEBUG=True` to the file. ## Examples 下列範例會使用表示開頭和結尾的程式執行。The following example uses to indicate the beginning and end of a program's execution. 此範例也會使用和來區別追蹤輸出。The example also uses and to distinguish the tracing output. [!code-cpp[Classic Debug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Debug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Debug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，方法只適用於偵錯組建。By default, the method works only in debug builds. 使用方法，如果您想要在版本中的判斷提示。Use the method if you want to do assertions in release builds. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[受控碼中的判斷提示](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code)。For more information, see [Assertions in Managed Code](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code). > [!IMPORTANT] > `Assert`方法不適用於[!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)]應用程式。The `Assert` methods are not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appstore_long](~/includes/win8-appstore-long-md.md)] apps. 一般而言，方法用來找出程式開發期間的邏輯錯誤。Typically, the method is used to identify logic errors during program development. 評估條件。 evaluates the condition. 如果結果是`false`，它會傳送失敗訊息給集合。If the result is `false`, it sends a failure message to the collection. 您可以自訂此行為，藉由新增，或移除其中一個，集合。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or removing one from, the collection. 當應用程式在使用者介面模式下執行時，它會顯示訊息方塊，顯示帶有檔案和行號的呼叫堆疊。When the application runs in user interface mode, it displays a message box that shows the call stack with file and line numbers. 訊息方塊包含三個按鈕：**中止**，**重試**，以及**忽略**。The message box contains three buttons: **Abort**, **Retry**, and **Ignore**. 按一下 **中止**按鈕終止應用程式。Clicking the **Abort** button terminates the application. 按一下 **重試**您傳送到偵錯工具中的程式碼，如果您的應用程式正在執行以偵錯工具，或如果不是開啟偵錯工具會提供。Clicking **Retry** sends you to the code in the debugger if your application is running in a debugger, or offers to open a debugger if it is not. 按一下 **忽略**會繼續進行下一個指令程式碼中。Clicking **Ignore** continues with the next instruction in the code. > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式不支援強制回應對話方塊，讓它們的行為相同的使用者介面模式和非使用者介面模式。apps do not support modal dialog boxes, so they behave the same in user interface mode and non-user interface mode. 將訊息寫入到在偵錯模式中，使用中的追蹤接聽程式，或在發行模式中寫入任何訊息。The message is written to the active trace listeners in debugging mode, or no message is written in release mode. > [!NOTE] > 訊息方塊的顯示取決於是否存在。The display of the message box depends on the presence of the . 如果不是處於集合，訊息方塊不會顯示。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. 可以藉由移除[<清除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，則[<移除>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md)，或藉由呼叫方法屬性 (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`)。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). 您可以變更的行為在組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。You can change the behavior of the in the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此檔案中，您可以啟用和停用判斷提示訊息方塊或設定屬性。In this file, you can enable and disable the assert message box or set the property. 組態檔的格式應該如下：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ``` ## Examples 下列範例會建立陣列的索引，會執行某些動作，若要設定的索引值，然後呼叫確認索引值是否有效。The following example creates an index for an array, performs some action to set the value of the index, and then calls to confirm that the index value is valid. 如果不是有效的輸出呼叫堆疊。If it is not valid, outputs the call stack. [!code-cpp[Classic Debug.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug.Assert Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Debug.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug.Assert Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Debug.Assert Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Debug.Assert Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會使用.NET framework 物件的值轉換成其文字表示，並在字串中內嵌該表示法。This method uses the of the .NET Framework to convert the value of an object to its text representation and embed that representation in a string. 產生的字串傳送至集合。The resulting string is sent to the collection. 根據預設，方法只適用於偵錯組建。By default, the method works only in debug builds. 使用方法，如果您想要在版本中的判斷提示。Use the method if you want to do assertions in release builds. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[受控碼中的判斷提示](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code)。For more information, see [Assertions in Managed Code](/visualstudio/debugger/assertions-in-managed-code). 一般而言，方法用來找出程式開發期間的邏輯錯誤。Typically, the method is used to identify logic errors during program development. 評估條件。 evaluates the condition. 如果結果是`false`，則方法呼叫而`detailMessageFormat`字串和`args`陣列會傳遞為參數。If the result is `false`, The method is called and the `detailMessageFormat` string and `args` array are passed in as parameters. 接著會傳送指定的文字訊息和格式化的文字訊息至集合。 then sends the specified text message and the formatted text message to the collection. 您可以自訂此行為，藉由新增，或移除其中一個，集合。You can customize this behavior by adding a to, or removing one from, the collection. 當應用程式在使用者介面模式下執行時，它會顯示訊息方塊，顯示帶有檔案和行號的呼叫堆疊。When the application runs in user interface mode, it displays a message box that shows the call stack with file and line numbers. 訊息方塊包含三個按鈕：**中止**，**重試**，以及**忽略**。The message box contains three buttons: **Abort**, **Retry**, and **Ignore**. 按一下 **中止**按鈕終止應用程式。Clicking the **Abort** button terminates the application. 按一下 **重試**您傳送到偵錯工具中的程式碼，如果您的應用程式正在執行以偵錯工具，或如果不是開啟偵錯工具會提供。Clicking **Retry** sends you to the code in the debugger if your application is running in a debugger, or offers to open a debugger if it is not. 按一下 **忽略**會繼續進行下一個指令程式碼中。Clicking **Ignore** continues with the next instruction in the code. > [!NOTE] > 視是否存在而定的訊息方塊顯示。The display of the message box is dependent on the presence of the . 如果不是處於集合，訊息方塊不會顯示。If the is not in the collection, the message box is not displayed. (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`)。The can be removed by the [<clear>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/clear-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), the [<remove>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/remove-element-for-listeners-for-trace.md), or by calling the method on the property (`System.Diagnostics.Trace.Listeners.Clear()`). disable the assert message box or set the property. 組態檔的格式應該如下：The configuration file should be formatted as follows: ```xml ```
